Text.Page:
Illumination is the key to knowledge, and sometimes it's the key to survival as well.

The stone lanterns light the path that leads to the {@Rgn:30016$$Stronghold Camp}. They shine day and night, keeping the refuge's more dangerous denizens at bay.

Or at least they did. The stone lanterns have gone dark.

Repairs to the stone lanterns won't make Balder's Refuge completely safe, but they will make it incrementally safer.

{@LinkCreature:230#1048$$Linok} at the {@Rgn:30015$$Archive Stronghold} will be overjoyed to hear that the lanterns shine once again.

You reignited the stone lanterns?

They will guide the wise to visit the {@Rgn:30016$$Stronghold Camp} and unravel the archive's mysteries.
